title: Tick Board - Web Kanban for Ticks
description: A local web server that displays ticks in a kanban board interface with human interaction capabilities (approve, reject, add notes). Server looks for .tick in current dir or takes path as argument.
notes: 2026-01-16 10:25 - Completed qai (Core server with CLI). Key decisions: Used cobra for CLI (consistent with modern Go practices), embedded static files using go:embed, server uses context-based graceful shutdown. Static files in internal/tickboard/server/static/. Next tasks should add API endpoints to server.go and build out the frontend in static files.
